Action.author: gudkov
Action.body: ~xnopre Hi, Thanks for reporting the issue. It looks like duplication for https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/IS-511 that is already in our backlog. Could you re-check?

Action.author: xnopre
Action.body: Hi ~gudkov . There is no description in IS-511 but yes, it seems to be duplication. But IS-511 was created one year ago... This point is very disadvantageous (painful) working all the day with the SDK... Is it possible to fix it soon ?

Action.author: gudkov
Action.body: We will try to prioritize this.
